name: Cave Bear
description: The Cave Bear is a large beast notable for its powerful build, featuring strong limbs and a formidable head with sharp teeth. It is a fierce predator in its natural habitat.
memorable: The Cave Bear excels in melee combat, using its powerful bite and grappling claws to dominate opponents.
goals: Predator looking to hunt for food and defend its territory.
relations: It may be found alongside other large beasts or in competition with other predators.
environment: Forests and caves, where it can hunt and navigate effectively.
strengths: High strength and constitution make it durable and capable of powerful melee attacks.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit its cunning and social interactions.
attacks: Multiattack action allows it to make two powerful melee attacks, using both bite and claws.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Smell grants it advantage on Perception checks reliant on scent, enhancing its tracking ability.
senses: Possesses a keen sense of smell, providing advantage on related Perception checks.
skills: Proficient in perception, allowing it to notice hidden dangers effectively.
additional_information: Grapples Medium or smaller creatures with its claws.
Has a strong bite that inflicts piercing damage.
Capable of evaluating threats in its terrain.
Instinct-driven with a very basic cognitive ability.
test_queries: large powerful bear that grapples enemies
predatory beast with keen sense of smell
ferocious cave dweller with strong melee attacks
big animal known for biting and clawing
